info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:33PM EDT until June 23 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN MONONGALIA AND NORTHERN PRESTON COUNTIES... At 632 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Uniontown, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Uniontown, Masontown, Farmington, Point Marion, Fairchance, Smithfield, Markleysburg, Greensboro, Brandonville, Chalkhill, Bruceton Mills, and Laurel Run. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
